issue.title: BLACS hang with continuous camera acquisitions

content.raw: Thanks for working out how to reproduce the issue! I'll see if I can get it to happen on one of my machines - once I can get it to lock up I should be able to fairly easily work out what the culprit is via using the faulthandler to dump tracebacks of all threads, or something like that.
content.html: Thanks for working out how to reproduce the issue! I'll see if I can get it to happen on one of my machines - once I can get it to lock up I should be able to fairly easily work out what the culprit is via using the faulthandler to dump tracebacks of all threads, or something like that.
